Field Name: Fiscal Year Deviation
Tooltip: Does the fiscal year deviate from the calendar year?

Field Name: Fiscal Year End
Tooltip: The date at which the fiscal year ends.

Field Name: Scope Of Entities
Tooltip: Are all Group legal entities covered in the reports?

Field Name: NFRD Mandatory
Tooltip: Is the NFRD mandatory for your company?

Field Name: EU Taxonomy Activity Level Reporting
Tooltip: Activity level disclosure

Field Name: Assurance
Tooltip: Level of assurance of the EU Taxonomy disclosure (Reasonable Assurance, Limited Assurance, None)

Field Name: Number Of Employees
Tooltip: Total number of employees (including temporary workers with assignment duration >6 months)

Field Name: UN Global Compact Principles Compliance Policy
Tooltip: Existence of a policy to monitor compliance with the UNGC principles.

Field Name: OECD Guidelines for Multinational Enterprises Compliance Policy
Tooltip: Existence of a policy to monitor compliance with the OECD Guidelines for Multinational Enterprises.

Field Name: ILO Core Labour Standards
Tooltip: Abidance by the ILO Core Labour Standards.

Field Name: Human Rights Due Diligence
Tooltip: Existence of due diligence processes to identify, prevent, mitigate and address adverse human rights impacts.

Field Name: Referenced Reports
Total Amount
Tooltip: Total revenue per annum

Field Name: Relative Share in Percent
Absolute Share
Tooltip: Absolute value and share of the revenue that is not part of a plan to meet the DNSH criteria and make substantial contribution to any environmental objective

Field Name: Relative Share in Percent
Tooltip: Relative share of the total eligible revenue in same currency than total revenue. Is part of the total revenue where the economic activity meets taxonomy criteria for substantial contribution to climate change mitigation and does no serious harm to the other environmental objectives (DNSH criteria).

Field Name: Absolute Share
Tooltip: Absolute value of the total eligible revenue in same currency than total revenue. Is part of the total revenue where the economic activity meets taxonomy criteria for substantial contribution to climate change mitigation and does no serious harm to the other environmental objectives (DNSH criteria).

Field Name: Relative Share in Percent
Tooltip: Relative share of the revenue that is associated with non taxonomy-aligned but eligible activities

Field Name: Absolute Share
Tooltip: Absolute value of the revenue that is associated with non taxonomy-aligned but eligible activities

Field Name: Non-Aligned Activities
Tooltip: Absolute value and share of the revenue per activity that is not taxonomy-aligned but eligible

Field Name: Relative Share in Percent
Tooltip: Relative share of the total eligible revenue that is taxonomy-aligned, i.e., generated by an eligible economic activity that is making a substantial contribution to at least one of the climate and environmental objectives, while also doing no significant harm to the remaining objectives and meeting minimum standards on human rights and labour standards. In same currency than total revenue.

Field Name: Absolute Share
Tooltip: Absolute value of the total eligible revenue that is taxonomy-aligned, i.e., generated by an eligible economic activity that is making a substantial contribution to at least one of the climate and environmental objectives, while also doing no significant harm to the remaining objectives and meeting minimum standards on human rights and labour standards. In same currency than total revenue.

Field Name: Aligned Activities
Tooltip: Absolute value and share of the revenue per activity that is taxonomy-aligned, i.e., generated by an eligible economic activity that is making a substantial contribution to at least one of the climate and environmental objectives, while also doing no significant harm to the remaining objectives and meeting minimum standards on human rights and labour standards

Field Name: Enabling Share In Percent
Tooltip: Share of the taxonomy-aligned revenue from total aligned revenue that is linked to activities that enable reduction of GHG in other sectors

Field Name: Transitional Share In Percent
Tooltip: Share of the taxonomy-aligned revenue from total aligned revenue that is linked to activities with significantly lower GHG emissions than the sector or industry average

Field Name: Total Amount
Tooltip: Total CapEx for the reported year. Capital expenditures are non-consumable investments, e.g. for acquiring, upgrading, and maintaining physical assets such as property, plants, buildings, technology

Field Name: Total Amount
Tooltip: Total OpEx for the financial year. Operating expenses (OpEx) are shorter term expenses required to meet the ongoing operational costs of running a business.
